trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class that supports creation of multiple-page elements from a single document.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base abstracta que suporta a criação de elementos da página de múltiplas de um único documento.

trans-unit.source: If you need automatic background repagination in response to events such as changing the page size of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, then use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator> as your base class.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de repagination automática em segundo plano em resposta a eventos, tal como alterar o tamanho da página de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>em seguida, utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator>como a sua classe base</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Cancels a previous <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync*> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela anterior <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync*>ou <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> operação.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync*>

trans-unit.source: If `userState` is `null`, then all asynchronous tasks are cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Se `userState` é `null`, em seguida, todas as tarefas assíncronas são canceladas.

trans-unit.source: The original `userState` passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync*>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountAsync*> that identifies the asynchronous task to cancel.
trans-unit.target: Original `userState` transmitido a <> </> *>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ou <> </> *> que identifica a tarefa assíncrona para cancelar.

trans-unit.source: Forces a pagination of the content, updates <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageCount*> with the new total, and sets <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Força uma paginação do conteúdo, as atualizações <> </> *> com o novo total e conjuntos <> </> *> para <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> will be `true` immediately after this is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>será `true` imediatamente após esta opção é denominada.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: If content is modified or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> is changed after this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> will likely revert to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o conteúdo é modificado ou <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>forem alteradas depois deste método é denominado, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>provavelmente irá reverter para `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, forces a pagination of the content, updates <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageCount*> with the new total, and sets <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: No modo assíncrono, força uma paginação do conteúdo, as atualizações <> </> *> com o novo total e conjuntos <> </> *> para <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to cancel the asynchronous operation of this method is to cancel all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: É a única forma de cancelar a operação assíncrona deste método para cancelar todas as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: Contrast this with the other overload of this method: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountAsync%28System.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: Contraste isto com a outra sobrecarga deste método: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountAsync%28System.Object%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountAsync%28System.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, forces a pagination of the content, updates <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageCount*> with the new total, sets <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: No modo assíncrono, força uma paginação do conteúdo, as atualizações <> </> *> com o novo total, define <> </> *> para <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified ID is assigned to the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: O ID especificado está atribuído à tarefa assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga do método torna possível cancelar esta operação assíncrona sem cancelar todas as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador exclusivo para a tarefa assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountAsync*> operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountAsync*>operação esteja concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountAsync*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> for the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref> para o número de página especificada.

trans-unit.source: If pages prior to `pageNumber` have not been formatted, they will be paginated synchronously prior to returning the requested page.
trans-unit.target: Se páginas antes `pageNumber` não foram formatado, irão ser paginated forma síncrona antes de regressar a página pedida.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> provides similar functionality as GetPage, but for asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>Fornece uma funcionalidade semelhante como GetPage, mas para a operação assíncrona.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the document page that is needed.
trans-unit.target: O número de página baseado em zero da página do documento que é necessária.

trans-unit.source: The for the specified pageNumber, or if the page does not exist.
trans-unit.target: O para especificado pageNumber , ou se a página não existe.

trans-unit.source: pageNumber is negative.
trans-unit.target: pageNumberé negativo.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously returns (through the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted"></xref> event) the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> for the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: No modo assíncrono devolve (através de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted"> </xref> evento) a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref> para o número de página especificada.

trans-unit.source: The only way to cancel the asynchronous operation of this method is to cancel all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: É a única forma de cancelar a operação assíncrona deste método para cancelar todas as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: Contrast this with the other overload of this method: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: Contraste isto com a outra sobrecarga deste método: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage> is passed to the event as one of the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>é transmitida para o evento como um dos argumentos de evento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%29> for how to use this method to get the page.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%29>para saber como utilizar este método para obter a página.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the document page that is needed.
trans-unit.target: O número de página baseado em zero da página do documento que é necessária.

trans-unit.source: pageNumber is negative.
trans-unit.target: pageNumberé negativo.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously returns (through the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted"></xref> event) the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> for the specified page number and assigns the specified ID to the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: No modo assíncrono devolve (através de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted"> </xref> evento) a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref> para o número de página especificada e atribui o ID especificado para a tarefa assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga do método torna possível cancelar esta operação assíncrona sem cancelar todas as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage> is passed to the event as one of the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>é transmitida para o evento como um dos argumentos de evento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage> asynchronously: 1.
trans-unit.target: Os passos seguintes mostram como obter um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>no modo assíncrono: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventHandler>delegar e adicioná-lo para ser notificado de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageAsync specifying the `pageNumber` desired and a unique `userState`, which will be used to identify the completion of the asynchronous event.
trans-unit.target: Chamar GetPageAsync especificando o `pageNumber` pretendida e um único `userState`, que será utilizado para identificar a conclusão do evento assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property with the original GetPageAsync `userState` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o evento ocorre e o delegado é chamado, compare o evento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> propriedade com o GetPageAsync original `userState` parâmetro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property will also match the `pageNumber` specified in the GetPageAsync call.) 4.
trans-unit.target: (O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> propriedade também corresponderá a `pageNumber` especificadas na chamada GetPageAsync.)</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs> 4.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property matches the original GetPageAsync `userState`, the operation is complete and the page is ready.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> propriedade corresponde a GetPageAsync original `userState`, a operação foi concluída e a página está pronta.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> to retrieve the formatted <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>.
trans-unit.target: Chamada <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>para obter a formatados <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> to get.
trans-unit.target: O número de página baseado em zero do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref> obter.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador exclusivo para a tarefa assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: pageNumber is negative.
trans-unit.target: pageNumberé negativo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync*>foi concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageCount*> is the total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageCount*>é o número total de páginas.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageCount*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if pagination is complete and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageCount*> is the total number of pages; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, if pagination is in process and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageCount*> is the number of pages currently formatted (not the total).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a paginação está concluída e <> </> *> é o total de número de páginas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, se paginação está em curso e <> </> *> é o número de páginas a formatados (não o total).

trans-unit.source: This value may revert to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, after being <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize*> or content changes; because those events would force a repagination.
trans-unit.target: Este valor pode reverter para <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, após <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, se <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize*>ou alterações de conteúdo porque esses eventos iriam tornar um repagination.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.ComputePageCountCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PagesChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PagesChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PagesChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PagesChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a count of the number of pages currently formatted
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém uma contagem do número de páginas a formatados atualmente

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> is `true`, pagination is complete and PageCount is the total number of pages in the document.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>é `true`, paginação está concluída e que PageCount é o número total de páginas no documento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> is `false`, pagination is in process and PageCount is the number of pages currently formatted (not the total).
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>é `false`, paginação está em curso e que PageCount é o número de páginas a formatados (não o total).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value may change if <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> or content changes, because those events would force a repagination.
trans-unit.target: Este valor pode ser alterada se <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>ou conteúdo alterações, porque esses eventos iriam tornar um repagination.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A count of the number of pages that have been formatted.
trans-unit.target: Uma contagem do número de páginas que tenham sido formatada.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document content is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o conteúdo do documento é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the suggested width and height of each page.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém ou define a largura sugerida e a altura de cada página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> may override the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>pode substituir o valor desta propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: Users should check <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os utilizadores devem verificar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of each page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura de cada página.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the element being paginated.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, devolve o elemento que está a ser paginated.

trans-unit.source: The object returned has this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> as the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource.DocumentPaginator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O objeto devolvido tem esta <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>como o valor do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource.DocumentPaginator%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource.DocumentPaginator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: It is guaranteed to have such a property because it implements <xref:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource>.
trans-unit.target: É garantido ter essa propriedade porque implementa <xref:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource"></xref> representing the element being paginated.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource"> </xref> que representa o elemento que está a ser paginated.
